Ronald Francis Kentan

  1. Alternate Birth Name: Ronnie
  2. Foster Name: Ronald Francis
  3. Foster Family: first, unmarried brother and sister Nicholas (Nick) and Margaret Doran; after their death, Mr. and Mrs. Patrick Doran. [Editorial note: I'm not sure this is accurate. Nick Doran died September 28, 1934, and the notice sends regards to "Margaret and Roland."See Albion Weekly News, 4 October 1934, 4:3.] Doran
  4. Location of Family: Albion, NE
  5. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  6. Arrival Place: Albion, NE
  7. Age on Arrival: 6
  8. Date of Birth: 1904-10-01, NY
  9. Date of Death: 1970-06-24, Albion, NE
  10. Gender: male
  11. Spouse Name: Mary Hannah Doran
  12. Source: Albion Weekly News (NE), 4 October 1934; 18 October 1934; Albion News (NE), 1 July 1970; Gravestone, Saint Michael Cemetery, Albion, NE
